hypothesis_content.title: Exchange Token Pairs with Volume Divergence Signal
hypothesis_content.statement: When the 3-day volume ratio between BNB and OKB diverges by more than 50% from their 30-day average price ratio, the price ratio will adjust to match volume leadership within 2 days with 68% probability across all regimes except STRESS.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Exchange token prices should reflect relative platform activity. Volume leadership typically precedes price adjustments as traders price in fundamental platform performance.
entry_conditions: Calculate 3-day average volume for BNB and OKB
Calculate 30-day average price ratio: BNB_price / OKB_price
Enter when volume_ratio > 1.5 * price_ratio (long BNB/short OKB) OR volume_ratio < 0.67 * price_ratio (short BNB/long OKB)

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price ratio adjusts to within 20% of volume ratio

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Price ratio fails to follow volume ratio >60% of the time OR signal-to-noise ratio < 1.0 OR regime dependency stronger than hypothesized
